A container is a standard unit of software that packages up code and all its dependencies so the application runs quickly and reliably from one computing environment to another (https://www.docker.com/resources/what-container/) .

16.content: Return to main website. This page demonstrates the packaged minimal layout, which does not render the sidebar or header. It can be used for standalone pages.
